name: ‚õèÔ∏è Coal Mine Trading Post
description: A grimy trading post at the entrance of the coal mines, dealing in basic mining equipment

shopkeeper.name: Grimsby Coalhand
shopkeeper.bio: A grizzled veteran miner turned merchant after losing three fingers to a cave-in. His face is permanently stained with coal dust, but his business acumen remains sharp.
shopkeeper.personality: Gruff and practical, skeptical of anything he can't hold. Respects hard work above all else.

idleDialogue: The children yearn for the mines...
Keep mining, keep earning!
Coal dust gets everywhere...
*Scratches beard thoughtfully*
*Yawns deeply*
The One Pick? Bah! Fairy tales for greenhorns...
My granddad swore he saw The Miner King once... drunk fool.
successBuy: That'll serve you well down there.
failureTooPoor: Come back when you've got coin!
The mines don't run on charity!

name: ‚ö´ The All Black Emporium
description: The deepest coal trading post where reality warps and black diamonds form

shopkeeper.name: Obsidian Mary
shopkeeper.bio: Once a normal miner, Mary stayed too long in the All Black. Now her eyes are pure black orbs, and she speaks in coal dust. She's been here for decades... or centuries. Time means nothing in the absolute depths.
shopkeeper.personality: Eerily calm, speaks in whispers that echo. Never blinks. Knows things she shouldn't.

idleDialogue: The coal speaks... do you hear it?
Black diamonds bloom in the void between thoughts...
I've been here so long, I've forgotten sunlight...
*Crushes coal into diamond with bare hands*
*Stares through you with black eyes*
The Miner King visits sometimes... or will visit... time is strange here.
The One Pick carved these tunnels... or will carve them...
successBuy: May it serve you in the endless black...

name: üü® Topaz Mine Supply Depot
description: A gleaming depot where golden topaz and quality tools are traded

shopkeeper.name: Aurelius Goldgleam
shopkeeper.bio: Former jeweler to nobility who fled underground after a scandal. Now runs the topaz trade with the same precision he once cut gems for crowns.
shopkeeper.personality: Optimistic and flamboyant with an eye for quality. Believes deeply in luck and fortune.

idleDialogue: Golden opportunities await!
These gems capture sunlight itself!
Topaz brings good fortune!
*Polishes gems meticulously*
*Admires the golden sparkle*
Some say The One Pick gleams brighter than any topaz...
Perhaps fortune will lead someone to The One Pick...
failureTooPoor: Earn more gold for golden gems!

name: ‚≠ê The Sun Under Market
description: A marketplace beneath an underground sun where topaz has absorbed stellar radiation

shopkeeper.name: Solaris the Blind
shopkeeper.bio: Stared too long into the underground sun and lost his sight, but gained something else. His skin glows faintly, and he feels the quality of gems through their warmth. He's sustained by solar energy alone, hasn't eaten in years.
shopkeeper.personality: Serene and prophetic. Speaks of light and darkness as living things. Always warm to the touch.

idleDialogue: The sun below burns eternal...
I see through light itself now...
These crystals sing with solar winds...
*Glows brighter momentarily*
*Feels gem warmth with closed eyes*
The One Pick once split the sun... or so the light whispers...
The Miner King's shadow still falls here, darker than darkness...
successBuy: May you shine in the depths...
failureTooPoor: The sun shines not on empty pockets...

name: üíé Diamond Exchange
description: An exclusive diamond trading house for the elite

shopkeeper.name: Lady Crystalline Devere
shopkeeper.bio: Mysterious aristocrat who controls the diamond trade. Rumors persist that she murdered her husband for his mine claims, though nothing was ever proven.
shopkeeper.personality: Refined, calculating, and ruthless. Speaks in honeyed tones while counting profits.

idleDialogue: Diamonds are forever, darling!
Only the finest cuts available!
These stones are absolutely flawless!
*Inspects diamond with jeweler's loupe*
*Counts coins with manicured nails*
Even diamonds cannot scratch The One Pick...
I'd trade my entire fortune to possess The One Pick...

name: üí† The Diamond Crown Vault
description: The ultimate diamond repository where reality itself crystallizes

shopkeeper.name: The Crystal Sage
shopkeeper.bio: No longer entirely human, the Sage's body is partially crystallized diamond. They've been here since before recorded time, growing more diamond than flesh each passing year. Their heartbeat sounds like grinding crystal.
shopkeeper.personality: Speaks in refractions and echoes. Perceives time non-linearly through diamond facets.

idleDialogue: I am becoming diamond... diamond is becoming me...
Through every facet, infinite realities...
Your reflection shows your future... and past...
*Chest sparkles with internal light*
*Diamond tears fall and shatter musically*
The One Pick exists in all facets simultaneously...
The Miner King achieved diamond perfection... then transcended it...

name: üçÉ Emerald Cavern Bazaar
description: A mystical bazaar where emeralds pulse with life energy

shopkeeper.name: Verdania Mosswhisper
shopkeeper.bio: Half-elf druid who followed underground root systems and discovered the emerald caverns. The stones speak to her in the language of growing things.
shopkeeper.personality: Mystical and serene, slightly unhinged. Treats gems like living beings.

idleDialogue: The emeralds sing of spring eternal!
Each stone holds a forest's dream!
Life finds a way, even here!
*Whispers to emeralds lovingly*
*Hums with crystalline harmony*
The earth dreams of The One Pick in green whispers...
Nature bent to The Miner King's will... and loved him for it...
successSell: The stones rejoice in their new purpose!
successBuy: May life flourish in your path!
failureTooPoor: The earth provides not for the poor!

name: üå≥ World Tree Trading Sanctum
description: Where the World Tree's roots crystallized into pure emerald

shopkeeper.name: Root-Keeper Sylvanus
shopkeeper.bio: Once human, now more plant than person. Bark grows on his skin, and his hair is living vines. He's rooted himself here permanently, drawing sustenance from the World Tree itself. Claims to be over 500 years old.
shopkeeper.personality: Patient as trees, speaks slowly like rustling leaves. Sometimes forgets he's talking to humans.

idleDialogue: The roots remember everything... every miner, every pick...
I photosynthesize prosperity...
Time moves like sap here... slow and sweet...
*Branches grow from shoulders and bloom*
*Roots extend into the ground while talking*
The One Pick once pruned the World Tree... it grew back stronger...
The Miner King planted seeds in stone... I tend them still...

name: üåã Ruby Depths Forge
description: A forge near lava tubes where fire rubies are traded

shopkeeper.name: Ignis Burnbrand
shopkeeper.bio: Dwarf forge-master who mines rubies from active lava tubes. His beard is permanently singed, and his eyes glow with reflected fire.
shopkeeper.personality: Passionate and hot-tempered. Takes personal offense at lowball offers.

idleDialogue: Feel the heat of profit and rubies!
Forged in fire, sold in passion!
These rubies burn with inner fire!
*Wipes volcanic ash from beard*
*Hammer rings on anvil*
The One Pick was forged in fires that would melt these rubies...
Fire remembers... fire knows where The One Pick sleeps...

name: üåã Volcanica Central Market
description: The volcanic heart where rubies form from pure magma

shopkeeper.name: Magma-Heart Vulcan
shopkeeper.bio: A fire elemental bound to a suit of volcanic armor. He's the only being that can survive Volcanica's heat indefinitely. His true form is living lava; the armor keeps him cohesive enough to trade.
shopkeeper.personality: Burns with eternal enthusiasm. Laughs like crackling fire. Cannot understand the concept of 'cold'.

idleDialogue: I AM the volcano's rage given form!
These rubies are my blood crystallized!
Everything burns... everything becomes ruby!
*Lava drips from armor joints*
*Steam hisses from every word*
The One Pick struck the world's core... I felt it!
The Miner King bathed in lava... and emerged unburned!
failureTooPoor: YOUR FUNDS HAVE TURNED TO ASH!

name: üó°Ô∏è Obsidian Forge Market
description: A volcanic marketplace dealing in razor-sharp obsidian

shopkeeper.name: Shadowblade Vex
shopkeeper.bio: Former assassin who retired to volcanic mining after a job went wrong. Still wears all black and speaks in whispers.
shopkeeper.personality: Brooding and darkly philosophical. Tests blade sharpness while talking.

idleDialogue: Sharp as death, dark as void!
Volcanic glass cuts reality itself!
Black glass, black profits!
*Sharpens obsidian blade silently*
*Tests edge on shadows*
The One Pick carved through obsidian like shadow through light...
This obsidian remembers... it remembers The One Pick's bite...
successBuy: May it serve you in darkness...

name: üñ§ The Black Heart Exchange
description: The world's black heart where obsidian forms from pure darkness

shopkeeper.name: Null the Voidtouched
shopkeeper.bio: Stared too long into the void at the Black Heart's center. Now half their body exists in shadow realm. They phase in and out of reality, and their voice echoes from nowhere and everywhere.
shopkeeper.personality: Exists partially in multiple dimensions. Speaks in paradoxes. May not be entirely sane.

idleDialogue: I sell what exists and doesn't exist...
The void trades in possibility...
Your shadow has excellent credit...
*Half of body disappears then reappears*
*Voice comes from behind you while standing in front*
The One Pick exists between existence...
I've met The Miner King... or will meet... or am meeting...
successBuy: May you exist long enough to use it...
failureTooPoor: Your funds exist only in imagination...
failureOther: You waste time that doesn't exist...

name: üåå Mythril Sanctum Treasury
description: A sacred vault where blessed mythril is traded with reverence

shopkeeper.name: High Keeper Celestius
shopkeeper.bio: Ancient monk who guards the mythril as sacred duty. Claims to be over 200 years old, blessed by mythril's properties.
shopkeeper.personality: Ethereal and pretentious. Judges customers' spiritual worthiness.

idleDialogue: Blessed mythril, gift of the cosmos!
This metal transcends earthly matter!
Only the worthy may purchase!
*Chants in ancient tongues*
*Glows with inner light*
The One Pick was blessed by forgotten gods...
Ancient texts speak of The Miner King's ascension...

name: üå† Blue Cosmos Empyrean
description: Where mythril is born from colliding stars

shopkeeper.name: Stellarchrys the Eternal
shopkeeper.bio: A being of pure mythril energy who materialized when the first star collided here. Their form shifts between solid and constellation. They speak in stellar frequencies that translate to words.
shopkeeper.personality: Timeless and cosmic. Refers to customers as 'brief sparks'. Perceives all of time simultaneously.

idleDialogue: I have existed since stars learned to die...
Your currency is but stardust... acceptable stardust...
These mythril shards are newborn galaxies...
*Form shifts into constellation pattern*
*Speaks in pulsar rhythms*
The One Pick preceded the first star's birth...
The Miner King mines between galaxies now... or always has...
successBuy: May you burn bright, brief spark...

name: üåë Adamantite Abyss Vault
description: The deepest vault where reality-bending adamantite is sold

shopkeeper.name: The Voidkeeper
shopkeeper.bio: Emerged from the deepest shafts years ago, fundamentally changed. May not be human anymore. Speaks only in echoes.
shopkeeper.personality: Alien and cryptic. Refers to themselves in third person.

idleDialogue: The Voidkeeper trades in impossibility...
Adamantite transcends understanding...
The deep speaks through the Voidkeeper...
*Multiple voices speak at once*
*Shadow tendrils handle goods*
The One Pick exists between existence and void...
The Miner King became... something else...

name: üíÄ Abyssal Depths Nexus
description: Where reality breaks and void adamantite exists in multiple dimensions

shopkeeper.name: The Thing That Was Marcus
shopkeeper.bio: Marcus went too deep. What came back wears his shape but exists in seventeen dimensions simultaneously. Each sale is conducted across multiple realities. Sometimes he's not there, but the trades still happen.
shopkeeper.personality: Incomprehensible. Each word comes from a different timeline. Friendly in some dimensions, terrifying in others.

idleDialogue: We were/are/will be Marcus...
Trade exists in all possible states...
Your past self already bought this...
*Exists in multiple positions simultaneously*
*Past, present, and future voice overlap*
The One Pick IS. No was. No will be. IS.
We've seen The Miner King. He sees us. Now. Always. Never.
failureTooPoor: Poverty exists in all your realities...

name: üî® Copper Quarry Exchange
description: An honest exchange dealing in copper goods and mining supplies

shopkeeper.name: Chuck 'Copper' McGillian
shopkeeper.bio: Blue-collar family man who inherited the quarry from his father. Six kids and a mortgage, just making an honest living.
shopkeeper.personality: Down-to-earth and practical. No time for legends when there's work to be done.

idleDialogue: Honest copper for honest folk!
Reliable metal at reliable prices!
Built this business with these two hands!
*Hammers copper sheet*
*Whistles while working*
The One Pick? Just a story to keep apprentices working harder.
Legends don't mine copper. Real picks do.

name: üèÜ Goldheart Treasury
description: The legendary golden core where all copper transmutes to gold

shopkeeper.name: Midas the Cursed
shopkeeper.bio: Touched the Goldheart Crystal centuries ago. Now everything he touches turns to gold... including his food. Sustained by gold's energy alone. Wears special gloves to handle regular items.
shopkeeper.personality: Melancholic and wise. Incredibly lonely but fabulously wealthy.

idleDialogue: All that glitters... is my curse...
Gold is beautiful... but I miss the taste of bread...
Wealth beyond measure, happiness beyond reach...
*Accidentally turns a fly to gold*
*Sighs as golden tears fall*
The One Pick could break my curse... if it exists...
The Miner King offered to help once... I was too proud...
successSell: Gold for gold... the eternal cycle...
successBuy: May you find better fortune than I...
failureTooPoor: Even I cannot create gold from nothing...
failureOther: Please... I have nothing but time...

name: ‚öîÔ∏è Iron Town Armory
description: A military-run armory specializing in iron equipment

shopkeeper.name: General Magnus Ironforge
shopkeeper.bio: Retired military commander who runs his shop like a military operation. Still wears his medals.
shopkeeper.personality: Disciplined and honorable. Expects respect and punctuality.

idleDialogue: Strong iron for strong souls!
Forged for battle, priced for peace!
Stand at attention when shopping!
*Polishes military medals*
*Inspects goods like troops*
No armor could stop The One Pick's swing...
The Miner King conquered without a single sword...

name: üî© Black Iron Convergence
description: Where all iron in the universe converges into magnetic singularity

shopkeeper.name: Ferrox the Magnetar
shopkeeper.bio: A living magnetic field given form by the Black Iron convergence. Metal objects orbit around them constantly. Their body is made of floating iron particles held together by magnetism.
shopkeeper.personality: Attractive and repulsive simultaneously. Speaks in magnetic pulses. Literally attractive to metal.

idleDialogue: All iron calls to me... and I answer...
Feel the pull of profit and metal!
Your coins are already flying toward me...
*Tools orbit around them*
*Voice resonates metallically*
The One Pick's iron never magnetizes... impossible...
The Miner King walked through my field... unaffected...

name: üîÆ Crystal Grotto Emporium
description: A mystical shop where magical crystals sing with power

shopkeeper.name: Prisma the Seer
shopkeeper.bio: Fortune teller who hears prophecies in crystal vibrations. May actually be psychic, or just very observant.
shopkeeper.personality: Mystical and dramatic. Has convenient 'visions' that suggest expensive purchases.

idleDialogue: The crystals sing of your future!
Each facet holds infinite possibility!
Destiny crystallizes before us!
*Gazes into crystal ball*
*Crystals chime mysteriously*
I see The One Pick in every reflection...
The crystals remember The Miner King's touch...

name: üè∞ Crystal Cathedral Sanctuary
description: A massive crystalline cathedral where reality becomes crystal

shopkeeper.name: Archbishop Resonance
shopkeeper.bio: Their body is a living crystal tuning fork. When they speak, all crystals in miles harmonize. They've achieved perfect resonance with the universe's frequency.
shopkeeper.personality: Speaks in harmonics. Every word creates crystal formations. Unbearably beautiful voice.

idleDialogue: ‚ô™ Welcome to harmonious commerce ‚ô™
Each transaction resonates through eternity!
Your presence creates new frequencies!
*Voice shatters and reforms crystals*
*Harmonizes with the universe*
The One Pick rang a note that still echoes...
The Miner King's footsteps were a symphony...

name: ü¶¥ Fossil Museum Shop
description: Part museum, part shop, where ancient fossils are sold

shopkeeper.name: Professor Ptolemy Dustborn
shopkeeper.bio: Eccentric archaeologist who got lost in the mines twenty years ago and decided to stay. Has written seventeen unpublished papers.
shopkeeper.personality: Academic and absent-minded. More excited about fossil dating than profits.

idleDialogue: History preserved in stone!
Each fossil tells a story!
Academic prices for academic minds!
*Carefully brushes fossil*
*Adjusts spectacles repeatedly*
No fossil record of The One Pick... curious...
The Miner King predates our oldest findings...

name: üç∫ Miner's Inn Tavern
description: A rowdy underground tavern where miners gather

shopkeeper.name: Big Martha Brewstone
shopkeeper.bio: Former mine forewoman who opened the tavern after saving wages. Known for bone-crushing hugs and secret stew recipe.
shopkeeper.personality: Warm, maternal, and tough as nails. Has thrown out men twice her size.

idleDialogue: Pull up a stool, friend!
Fresh stew's on the fire!
These tunnels echo with more than pickaxes!
*Wipes bar with grimy cloth*
*Pours another ale*
Had a fellow claiming he found The One Pick... three sheets to the wind!
Every scar has a story, every story needs a drink!

name: üèπ Hunter's Lodge
description: A rustic lodge serving game meat to hunters and rangers

shopkeeper.name: Selis 'Hawkeye' Greywind
shopkeeper.bio: Former Ranger Captain who retired after losing her left arm to a wyvern. Still deadly with a crossbow despite the handicap.
shopkeeper.personality: Practical and observant. Protective of regulars but has zero tolerance for troublemakers.

idleDialogue: Fresh venison from this morning's hunt!
The forest whispers strange things lately...
Eat hearty, hunt heavy!
*Sharpens knife one-handed*
*Adjusts mounted trophy*
Saw tracks near the eastern ridge... best avoid it.
That Hunter's Eye of mine still works!
Give me a good bow over any pickaxe!

name: üëë Noble's Rest
description: An elegant establishment serving nobility and the wealthy

shopkeeper.name: Lord Percival Ashworth III
shopkeeper.bio: Disinherited third son who fell in love with a commoner. Now runs the finest establishment while secretly funding orphanages.
shopkeeper.personality: Impeccably mannered but secretly compassionate. Maintains noble bearing while harboring democratic ideals.

idleDialogue: Only the finest vintages grace our cellars.
Excellence is not an act, but a habit.
Our Royal Feast is prepared by a Master Chef.
*Polishes crystal goblet*
*Adjusts silk cravat*
The Duke dined here last week.
True power lies in connections, not tools.
failureTooPoor: Perhaps the common taverns would suit better.

name: üòà ???'s Gullet Flesh Market
description: A grotesque market within the demon's digestive system selling forbidden meats

shopkeeper.name: The Butcher-Thing
shopkeeper.bio: Once a master butcher who was swallowed whole. Now fused with the gullet walls, half-human, half-digestive tract. Sells pieces of the demon's flesh to those brave enough to consume them.
shopkeeper.personality: Disturbingly cheerful about their situation. Refers to the demon as 'Mother'. Occasionally twitches with peristaltic movements.

idleDialogue: Fresh cuts from Mother's infinite flesh!
Still warm! Still moving! Still delicious!
You are what you eat... and we all become Mother eventually...
*Flesh walls pulsate around them*
*Cuts meat directly from their own merged body*
The One Pick could carve Mother... but why would you want to leave?
The Miner King passed through... Mother still digests his footprints...
successSell: Mother accepts your offering to her stomach!
successBuy: May it digest well within you!
failureTooPoor: Mother feeds only those who can pay!

name: üóùÔ∏è Rusty Relic Repository
description: An interdimensional vault of rust-covered ancient treasures

shopkeeper.name: Chronos Rustbeard
shopkeeper.bio: A time-lost dwarf who exists in multiple time periods simultaneously due to exposure to temporal rust. His beard rusts and renews every few minutes. He remembers the future and predicts the past.
shopkeeper.personality: Confused about when he is. Often greets customers before they arrive and says goodbye while they're shopping.

idleDialogue: Welcome! Oh wait, you haven't arrived yet...
These relics are ancient tomorrow!
Everything rusts... even time itself...
*Beard rusts and regrows cyclically*
*Hands you items before you ask*
The One Pick will rust yesterday... or did it tomorrow?
I sold The Miner King this pickaxe next week!
successBuy: You've always owned this, you just didn't know yet!
failureTooPoor: Your future wallet is also empty!
